Text: i installed the game, everything was going great until about 10 mins into the game where he gets to the black car, clicks on it to look in it, then when I click on the cigarette butts in the car, i get a message saying "law & order exe has stopped working' and I can't go any further.  Is there something wrong with the file? can I fix it?  There was no crack or anything.
It`s just strange that this game weight just 136 megabytes. Perhaps its some kind of fake. Were there L$O,Criminal Intent 2 anyway?
